snippet: Players from Chicago-based Jackie Robinson West, who are competing in the Little League World Series, are bucking the trend of fewer black athletes playing baseball.
abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column on Chicago-based youth baseball team Jackie Robinson West, who are competing in the Little League World Series; credits all-black team with providing hope to other black youths who do not view baseball as a viable sports option.
lead_paragraph: Players from Chicago-based Jackie Robinson West, who are competing in the Little League World Series, are bucking the trend of fewer black athletes playing baseball.

headline.seo: Jackie Robinson West Inspires Dialogue on Race at Little League World Series
headline.main: All-Black Team Provides More Than a Little Hope
headline.print_headline: All-Black Team Provides More Than a Little Hope
